name: h3
description: Discover the 2025 Mizuno CRBN Pro Drop 9 Fastpitch Softball Bat, a top choice for both contact and power hitters. This bat, part of the CRBN Pro series, features a sleek white, black, and purple colorway and is designed with a two-piece composite structure for enhanced performance. Certified by USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, it boasts a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter with a low barrel compression Detonator Cor for better performance and sound. The Dual Frequency Dampener minimizes vibrations, while the innovative Cylinder Seaming ensures consistency across the barrel. Enhanced with Black Onyx Carbon for durability and an optimized end cap for a great sound and more pop on the sweet spot, it is equipped with a Speed Helix Grip for comfort and durability. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
